Yes I saw the Jan and Feb options are already disaster. Good thing I already moved earlier to very very long dates. 

Why? They want you to avoid buying before the earning release.

Plus they want to post loss so that they can report loss for tax purpose in 2022 to pay minimal tax.

This is fairly normal and no need to reason with spreading or bragging.

This shows pattern that last year March dumping has moved to Jan dumping. This time we will see bigger rally on Feb and March.
